Not-Rettung

𒈾𒊏𒊒𒋾 na-ra-ru-ti Not-Rettung "aid, help" ⲛⲉⲙ-ϯⲧⲟⲧ⳼ give hand, help, aid to

𓈖 𓂋 𓆂 𓂡 | protect? | 𐎐𐎙𐎗 nġr enguard (𓂋 𓆂 grain)

𓈖 𓆓 𓐩 𓏌 𓏛 | save, protect | Not-guard ≠ הֵגֵן hegén hagen hecken @ home حَمَى ḥamā 𓈖 𓆓 𓐩 𓏌 𓏛 | save, protect | Not-Schutz: ⲛⲧⲉⲛ- ⲥⲱϯ , ⲥⲉⲧ- , ⲥⲟⲧ⳼ rescue, save from 𓈖 𓈟 𓅓 𓀜 | save, rescue | наҷот najot™ নাজাত najat necat نَجَاة najāh™ نجات دادن nejât dâdan 𓈖 𓈟 𓅓 𓀜 | save, rescue, withdraw (oneself) | nimm ⇔ take oneself to… / Nimnon / 𓈖 𓉔 𓏏 𓉐 | shelter, refuge | Not…Tor מִקְלָט miklát 𓈖 𓉔 𓏏 𓉐 = dìon RTL 𓈖 𓉔 𓅪 | escape (death) | √naut <> Not not today <> 𓅱 𓉔 𓂢 | escape | (𓅱 wn)
